name: KING ARTHUR IN SPACE VS. THE ZOMBIE ROBOT ALIENS
name_original: KING ARTHUR IN SPACE VS. THE ZOMBIE ROBOT ALIENS
description:
This is a prototype of a rogue-lite shooter made entirely in javascript from scratch. Feel free to share your thoughts and give any suggestions that cross your mind.

Move using arrow keys, AWSD, your joypad or tapping/clicking on the screen.

The character continuously fire toward the nearest enemy, collect the orbs to upgrade. That's all for now.

Graphics by 0x72 

fyi, JARLS means Just Another Rougue-lite Shooter
